cosmos#000 E36 M3 autocross and HPDE log

09/22/2014 BIR Performance Driving School

28 Sep 2014

Some video and data from my most recent trip to Gary Curtis' Performance Driving School at Brainerd International Raceway.

Videos

My fastest lap of the day according to the data logger was a 1:58.82 but the best my Go-Pro captured was this 1:59.57.

10 minutes of low-traffic lapping on the 3.1 mile long course. Passed by a cool formula car ~1:35 mark.

Highlights

  • Fastest Donnybrooke/long course lap: 1:58.82
  • Fastest Competition/short course lap: ??? (TODO: Dig through videos)
  • Top speed: 130.5 mph (Donnybrooke)
